title: @Riot, I present to you a brand spanking new idea: PAID VISUAL UPDATES!
body:
With the success of Spirit Guard Udyr and, _at a stretch_, Zord Rumble and Rambo Teemo, it is clear that the League of Legends community has a sizable demand for paying for things.

This is a good idea that could possibly separate us upper-middle class SOHO-lifestyle overlords from the mouth-breathing, bottom-feeding, welfare-leeching Riven/Katarina/Nasus mains who can only afford Unchained Alistar and Riot Girl Tristana.

That is all, GD. I expect your full support.
